articles.description: Former Liverpool and Man City star Balotelli only joined Brescia on a three-year deal in August but has frustrated Cellino due to his persistent absence from training
articles.content:
Notorious football bad boy Mario Balotelli looks to be on the verge of the sack from current club Brescia. 
The Italian forward, 29, is onto his eighth club having struggled to settle at any of his … [+3120 chars]

articles.author: Freddie Keighley
articles.title: Wesley Sneijder claims he could have been like Cristiano Ronaldo and Lionel Messi - Mirror Online
articles.description: The Netherlands icon believes he could have matched the achievements of the two best players of the 21st century - but he was not willing to give up "a glass of wine at dinner"
articles.content:
Wesley Sneijder insists he could have become as good a player as Cristiano Ronaldo or Lionel Messi. 
But the Netherlands legend admits he "didn't feel" like making the sacrifices the two superstars … [+2101 chars]

articles.author: By Kieran Lynch For Mailonline
articles.title: Wilfried Zaha opens up on Arsenal interest after Gunners chased winger before signing Nicolas Pepe - Daily Mail
articles.description: Arsenal were interested in signing Wilfried Zaha last summer and lodged a £40m bid for the Crystal Palace winger. However Palace played hardball and Arsenal instead signed Nicolas Pepe.
articles.content:
Wilfried Zaha has revealed it was an 'amazing' feeling when he found out that Arsenal were pursuing him last summer.
The Gunners were interested in signing the 27-year-old during last summer's trans… [+2056 chars]

articles.description: Former Reds defender Jon Otsemobor recalled an occasion when Diouf arrived unexpectedly in the early hours of a day they had training - and admits he felt used by his former teammate
articles.content:
